text: Rupert Bottenberg (born 19 July 1971 in Wolfville, Nova Scotia) is a comic artist and writer. He works for the Montreal Mirror newsweekly. Bottenberg grew up in Montreal. He started "Comix Jams, public events centered around collaborative, improvised comic art," a concept other North American cities copy. His way of drawing is called "clean-line" and full of "technical precision." ==References== ==Other websites== *Home page Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:Canadian writers Category:Comics artists Category:People from Nova Scotia
title: Rupert Bottenberg
